page.title: 10WARDLEWORTH
page.content: .I live in Wardleworth.My street is Rothwell St.next to Park Road.I like my next door neighbours because they are not noisy and don't shout.There is a library nearby and you can choose four books. There is a big park nearby and we play on the swings and slides.I live near a good chip shop and the lady who owns it is Scottish.Next door to the chip shop lives my friend Azra.Near Azra's house is a fruit and vegetable shop which also sells general groceries.Nearby there are some new houses being built.They are very beautiful and have gardens.I think that Wardleworth is a good place to live in but if I could change it I would like to see more grass and trees and less roads and pavements.
